channel.title: Cybersecurity on Sequr
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Sequr

item.title: Detecting Pegasus spyware on your smartphone
item.description: Using Amnesty International’s Mobile Verification Kit to detect NSO’s Pegasus spyware on your smartphone

item.title: Upgrade your SSH keys (to Ed25519)
item.description: If you’re still using SSH RSA keys with a short key length, it’s time to upgrade to Ed25519

item.title: Pi-hole vs Phishing
item.description: The Pi-hole is a powerful tool against tracking but can be used to protect against phishing as well.
